\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* said \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Dinah’s father \w and|strong="H5869"\w* brothers, “\w Grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* whatever \w you|strong="H5414"\w* ask.

\w But|strong="H6030"\w* because \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w had|strong="H3290"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w their|strong="H3290"\w* sister \w Dinah|strong="H1783"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H2930"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H2930"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hamor|strong="H2544"\w* \w deceitfully|strong="H4820"\w*.

Their offer \w seemed|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hamor|strong="H2544"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7927"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*.

But \w they|strong="H6213"\w* replied, “\w Should|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* have \w treated|strong="H6213"\w* \w our|strong="H6213"\w* sister \w like|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w*?”
